data.title: Stop Place Overview
data.table.header.name: Name
home.description: Inanna is your React starter kit for Entur Open Source applications— providing a consistent, Material-UI based design system and out-of-the-box support for authentication, routing, and common data workflows.
home.features.title: With Inanna you get:
home.features.layout.headline: Responsive Layout
home.features.layout.description: A responsive AppBar + Drawer layout, with built-in search and user menus.
home.features.map.headline: Geospatial MapView
home.features.map.description: A MapView scaffold powered by React-Map-GL/MapLibre for geospatial features.
home.features.data.headline: Data Management
home.features.data.description: A DataOverview page template for listing, filtering, and visualizing your Entur data.
home.features.auth.headline: Authentication Ready
home.features.ui.headline: Themeable & Accessible
home.features.ui.description: A themeable, accessible UI foundation so you can focus on your unique business logic—not boilerplate.
home.features.localization.headline: Multi-Language Support
home.features.localization.description: Experience the application in your preferred language with the localization feature
map.layers.title: Map Layers
workArea.title: Work area
